item.title: üêû GitVersioning: 'ThisAssembly' Is Inaccessible Due to Its Protection Level
item.description: üò® Problem After I installed the Nerdbank.GitVersioning Nuget package in my .NET MVC app to get the version using ThisAssembly.AssemblyInformationalVersion, the following error came out when building the app: error CS0122: 'ThisAssembly' is inaccessible due to its protection level I tried to install the package on all the projects in the same solution. It didn’t work. I tried to uninstall and re-ininstall the packate. It didn’t work. üòÄ Solution .csproj Turns out there is something missing in my .
